thread.title: Newsome growing in stature in UConn’s offense
thread.title_full: Newsome growing in stature in UConn’s offense

author: Neill Ostrout Journal Inquirer
title: Newsome growing in stature in UConn’s offense
text:
John Raoux Nimble Newsome 
UConn tailback Arkeel Newsome has had more room to run in recent weeks, and he has made the most of it. (AP Photo/John Raoux) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 12:59 am 
STORRS — UConn quarterback Bryant Shirreffs knows exactly what defenders who try to tackle Arkeel Newsome often go through. 
He watches the elusive UConn tailback run away from him all the time. 
“I know this, I’d hate to be a defender trying to tackle Newsome. He’s so shifty and he’s so elusive getting out of tackles,” Shirreffs said as the Huskies prepared for today’s homecoming game against South Florida at Pratt & Whitney Stadium. “It’s exciting to see from my perspective. I see him running down the field and I see defenders closing on him, then somehow he’s in the end zone.” kAm(96? &r@??
